assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 01-simple-positive-return: Canonical 2-cashflow case: 2.5x return over 5 years yields ~20.10% IRR. Excel validated.
assertionResults.title: 01-simple-positive-return: Canonical 2-cashflow case: 2.5x return over 5 years yields ~20.10% IRR. Excel validated.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 02-negative-return-loss: 90% loss over 5 years yields -36.89% annualized IRR. Tests negative rate handling.
assertionResults.title: 02-negative-return-loss: 90% loss over 5 years yields -36.89% annualized IRR. Tests negative rate handling.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 03-multi-round-partial-distributions: Seed + Series A + partial exit + final NAV. Tests multi-round VC fund pattern.
assertionResults.title: 03-multi-round-partial-distributions: Seed + Series A + partial exit + final NAV. Tests multi-round VC fund pattern.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 04-quarterly-flows: Quarterly follow-on rounds + large exit spike. Tests frequent cashflow spacing.
assertionResults.title: 04-quarterly-flows: Quarterly follow-on rounds + large exit spike. Tests frequent cashflow spacing.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 05-zero-return-breakeven: Exact 1x return (breakeven) yields 0% IRR. Tests numerical stability near zero.
assertionResults.title: 05-zero-return-breakeven: Exact 1x return (breakeven) yields 0% IRR. Tests numerical stability near zero.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 06-newton-success-smooth: Verify Newton converges in <10 iterations for typical case.
assertionResults.title: 06-newton-success-smooth: Verify Newton converges in <10 iterations for typical case.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 07-newton-failure-bisection-fallback: Multiple sign changes within 3 months stress Newton-Raphson. Brent or bisection should succeed.
assertionResults.title: 07-newton-failure-bisection-fallback: Multiple sign changes within 3 months stress Newton-Raphson. Brent or bisection should succeed.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 10-maximum-iterations-reached: Insufficient iterations should fail gracefully with null (not throw).
assertionResults.title: 10-maximum-iterations-reached: Insufficient iterations should fail gracefully with null (not throw).

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 11-excel-actual365-date-convention: Golden set test: Excel XIRR = 0.201034... (8 decimal precision).
assertionResults.title: 11-excel-actual365-date-convention: Golden set test: Excel XIRR = 0.201034... (8 decimal precision).

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 12-same-day-cashflow-aggregation: Same-day flows aggregate to single -$10M on 2020-01-01. Result matches scenario 01.
assertionResults.title: 12-same-day-cashflow-aggregation: Same-day flows aggregate to single -$10M on 2020-01-01. Result matches scenario 01.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 13-leap-year-handling: 2-day period in leap year. Actual/365 uses 365 denominator always (not 366). 1% gain over 2 days = 515% annualized IRR. CORRECTED in Phase 1.2 from 4.2843 (truth case bug).
assertionResults.title: 13-leap-year-handling: 2-day period in leap year. Actual/365 uses 365 denominator always (not 366). 1% gain over 2 days = 515% annualized IRR. CORRECTED in Phase 1.2 from 4.2843 (truth case bug).

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 14-date-ordering-unsorted: Reverse-sorted input should yield same result as scenario 01 (order-invariant).
assertionResults.title: 14-date-ordering-unsorted: Reverse-sorted input should yield same result as scenario 01 (order-invariant).

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 15-timezone-independent: PST and IST timestamps normalize to UTC midnight. Should match scenario 01.
assertionResults.title: 15-timezone-independent: PST and IST timestamps normalize to UTC midnight. Should match scenario 01.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 16-no-sign-change-all-positive: All-positive cashflows violate IRR definition. Should return null.
assertionResults.title: 16-no-sign-change-all-positive: All-positive cashflows violate IRR definition. Should return null.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 17-no-sign-change-all-negative: All-negative cashflows violate IRR definition. Should return null.
assertionResults.title: 17-no-sign-change-all-negative: All-negative cashflows violate IRR definition. Should return null.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 18-insufficient-cashflows-single: IRR requires at least 2 cashflows. Excel would return #NUM! error.
assertionResults.title: 18-insufficient-cashflows-single: IRR requires at least 2 cashflows. Excel would return #NUM! error.

assertionResults.fullName: XIRR Truth Cases (50 scenarios) 19-out-of-bounds-extreme-rate: Extreme short-term returns yield rates >1000%. Implementation clamps IRR at 900% to avoid unusable values.
assertionResults.title: 19-out-of-bounds-extreme-rate: Extreme short-term returns yield rates >1000%. Implementation clamps IRR at 900% to avoid unusable values.
